title: The S*ave of the “Black Knights” Is Recruited by the “White Adventure’s Guild” As an S-ranked Adventurer - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Corruption   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Fearless Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Kingdoms   Knights   Lack of Common Sense   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Tsundere
author: Jiou   寺王
description:
I worked like a slave in the chivalric order, where all the outcomes were exploited my senior, but I was scouted by a pretty little girl who called herself a guildmaster.

Initially I accept it half-jokingly but after I was shown a great sum of advance payment, I decide to leave the chivalric order. When I went to the guild, even the title of S-rank was prepared.

—This is a success story of a man who has never had a good thing since he was born.>
